summary: A simple mod that replaces the looks of a vanilla follower: Aranea Ienith
descriptionHtml:
What is this mod?

                                   Changes the face of a well balance vanilla mage follower, Aranea Ienith.  No custom race was made to create her new face.  So 
                                 everything should work the way Bethesda want it be.  Script wise of course.  She will now level up with the player with no caps

[size=5]Credits:[/size]
[size=2]  
[/size]                                 Support and endorse these modders if you like their work

                                *[size=3]RaceMenu[/size] by [b]Expired - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624
[/b]                                *[size=3]SG Hair by [/size][b]Hello Santa - Download site taken down :(
[/b]                                *[size=3]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/size] by [b]dimon99 - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709
[/b]                                *[size=3]Natural Lighting ENB[/size] by [b]Confidence-Man - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065
[/b]                                *[size=3]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/size] by [b]Gopher - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222
[/b]                                [b]*[/b][size=3]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/size] by [b]CaBaL - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909
[/b]                                *[size=3]Fair Skin Complexion[/size] by [b]HHaleyy - [/b][color=#7c7c7c][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602


[/b][/color][size=5]Requirements:[/size]
[size=2]   
[/size]                                *Body Mod of your choosing
                                *High Quality skin textures for that body

                                [color=#00ff00][size=4][u]NOTE[/u]: [/size][size=3]The main reason that my mods are not standalone is simple, flexibility.  From experience, I know
[/size]                                              [size=3]how frustrating it is to download a custom NPC and not have the right textures and or armor to
[/size]                                              [size=3]match.  Resulting on a weird looking skin and or neck seam throughout your game play.  With my                                            replacer mods, you won't have that problem.  You can switch any body/textures you want and my                                            mod will use it

[/size][/color][size=5]Installation and load order:

[/size]                                 I highly recommend using a mod manager to keep everything organized and stable

                                *Manual Installation (NOT RECOMMENDED) - Once the requirements are installed.  Download and extract the archive with [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-zip[/url] or a 
                                 similar program. Place the contents in the Skyrim's 'Data' folder.
                                *To Un-install - Delete placed contents
                                *Load Order - (from top) 1. Body mod  2. Skin Texture mod  3. This mod

[b]Important:

[/b]                               [color=#ff0000][size=4]If you already recruited Aranea and have the[/size][/color] [color=#ff0000]"NPC naked Bug", do this:[/color]
                               *[size=2]After installation, m[/size]ake her wait in a different location then save your game(a different cell preferably). [size=2]Exit/quit, then close the                                       game.  Reload your saved game.  Wait 24 hour in-game time.  Go back to her and happy gaming[/size]
author: hyde606
